name: Master of Elements (Diego Cervantes Zeledón)
description:
Master of elements is a 2D arcade game, in which the main objective is to destroy projectiles that will fall from the top of the screen, to earn the most points.

You will take the role of a magician who is extremely powerful, managing to control the four elements, water, fire, earth and wind. Each enemy can be destroyed with its corresponding power. In this simple game your skills and reactions will be tested to remember and select the right power, at the right time, to destroy the projectile.
